# This is plotly set up

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```


```{r}
data("instacart")

instacart_rank = 
  instacart %>%
  count(aisle) %>% 
	filter(n > 1000) %>% 
	mutate(
		aisle = factor(aisle),
		aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n)
	) %>%
	mutate(rank = min_rank(desc(n))) %>% 
	filter(rank < 50) %>% 
	arrange(aisle, rank)
  
```
